Balloon.definition: being or having a final installment that is much larger than preceding ones in an installment or term loan [a payment] NOTE

1.1: being or having a final installment that is much larger than preceding ones in an installment or term loan [a payment]
1.note: In contrast to an amortized loan, a balloon loan is generally repaid in periodic payments of interest and a large, lump sum payment of principal at the end of the term.
